name: Welcome to Labcorp
description: We worked really hard on this game and I hope it shows! However, we were not able to implement everything we would like. The story and tutorial are largely incomplete, there is no music or sound effects, and there are a few movement bugs. WASD to move, spacebar to jump, press spacebar next to a wall to climb it. Robots heal you, they are friendly.  remember: think outside the box.
